radiographic_examinations.findings: New small left pleural effusion with adjacent atelectasis. Nonfocal liver, pancreas, spleen, and adrenal findings. Mildly prominent small bowel loops with air-fluid levels suggestive of postoperative ileus. Surgically absent appendix and cecum. Mild cecal wall hyperenhancement likely reactive. Small volume nonhemorrhagic free fluid in the right lower quadrant, suggesting peritonitis. Rim enhancing fluid collection in the deep pelvis measuring 4.0 x 2.7 x 2.6 cm.
